/* This example requires Tailwind CSS v2.0+ */ import { Fragment, useState } from "react" import { Dialog, Transition } from "@headlessui/react" import { CheckIcon } from "@heroicons/react/24/outline" import { useContext } from "react" import PortfolioContext, { PortfolioProvider, } from "../context/PortfolioContext" export default function Modal() { const [open, setOpen] = useState(true) const { setCurrentPage } = useContext(PortfolioContext) const handleClose =() =>{ setOpen(false) setCurrentPage('about') } return (
Submitted!

Thank you for reaching out, I will get right back to you!

) }
